Issue.creator: denyeart
Issue.summary: Ledger consistent simulation (RocksDB snapshot option): As a consumer or ledger APIs (endorser), I want to perform proposal simulation using a consistent view of ledger state, by optionally using RocksDB snapshots
Issue.description: Consistent reads has been implemented by using locks between readers and writers. This task would implement consistent reads by using RocksDB snapshots, so that reads and writes can occur in parallel. We then need to compare the two options and determine which one is better, e.g. from a performance perspective.
